content: looking to add a handmade touch to your home this season the autumn granny square pillow is the perfect cozy addition this crochet pillow cover pattern is easy to make and works up in breeze this pattern includes photos and a video tutorial details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - pillow size is 20 by 20 inches materials yarn pattern is made using a number 4 worsted-weight yarn down below you ll find the yarn that i used for this pattern i made one pillow using hobbi s tea time xl yarn and i made the other one with lion brand fisherman s wool yarn either yarn can be used or you can use another number 4 worsted-weight yarn 2 skeins of hobbi s tea time xl yarn in the color hibiscus weight 4/ 7 1 oz 437 yds 2 skeins of lion brand fisherman wool yarn in the color natural weight 4/ 8 oz 465 yds - 5 0 mm h crochet hook - 20″ x 20″ inch pillow - darning needle - scissors - stitch markers
